amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 53, 59, 60, 62 through 97, and 103 printed in House Report 113-117. See page D604 of the Congressional Record of Wednesday, June 19, 2013, for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of Part B amendments Nos. 53, 59, 60, 62 through 97, and 103 printed in House Report 113-117.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lucas amendments (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A045) offered by Mr. Lucas.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lucas amendments (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A045) offered by Mr. Lucas.
